snippet: Jurors in the trial of Gilberto Valle, the New York police officer accused of plotting to kidnap and eat women, ended their first full day of deliberation without reaching a verdict.
abstract: Jurors in trial of Gilberto Valle, New York police officer accused of plotting to kidnap and eat women, end their first full day of deliberation without reaching verdict.
lead_paragraph: Jurors in the trial of Gilberto Valle, the New York police officer accused of plotting to kidnap and eat women, ended their first full day of deliberation without reaching a verdict.

headline.seo: Jury in Cannibal Case Is Sent Home for Weekend
headline.main: In Cannibal Case, Deliberations Go On
headline.print_headline: In Cannibal Case, Deliberations Go On
